trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> classes along with the semantics for forward-chaining execution of those rules.
trans-unit.target: Contiene una raccolta di classi <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> insieme alla semantica per l'esecuzione della concatenazione diretta delle regole.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> can be executed directly in code or using the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.PolicyActivity" /> activity.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> può essere eseguito direttamente nel codice oppure utilizzando l'attività <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.PolicyActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: Nome di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> class by using the name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> utilizzando il nome della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: Nome di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.

trans-unit.source: A description of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: Descrizione della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> class by using the name and description of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> utilizzando il nome e la descrizione della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the forward chaining behavior for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> classes in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il comportamento della concatenazione diretta per le classi <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> in <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleChainingBehavior" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> classes in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleChainingBehavior" /> per le classi <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> in <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a deep copy of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea una copia completa dell'oggetto corrente della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> that is identical to this instance.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> identica all’istanza.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a description of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la descrizione della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.

trans-unit.source: A description of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: Descrizione della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> da confrontare con l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two object instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se due istanze di un oggetto sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the objects are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se gli oggetti sono uguali. In caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> that is invoking the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> associata a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> che richiama la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.

trans-unit.source: Evaluates the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> instances in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: Valuta le istanze <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> nella classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="ruleExecution" /> is a <see langword="null" /> reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="ruleExecution" /> è un riferimento <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The cached <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution" /> cannot be validated.
trans-unit.target: Impossibile convalidare la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution" /> memorizzata nella cache.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il codice hash per l'istanza.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Codice hash per l'istanza.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene e imposta il nome della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: Nome di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> classes in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un elenco delle classi <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> in <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.

trans-unit.source: A list of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> classes in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: Elenco delle classi <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> in <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager" /> to manage the validation process.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager" /> per la gestione del processo di convalida.

trans-unit.source: Validates the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> attributes and the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> classes in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.
trans-unit.target: Convalida gli attributi della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> e le classi <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> in <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection" /> of errors found during validation.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection" /> contenente gli errori rilevati durante la convalida.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> contains errors (the `Validate` method returns `false`), then <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> contains the list of errors encountered.
trans-unit.target: Se l'oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> contiene errori (il metodo `Validate` restituisce `false`), la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> conterrà l'elenco degli errori che si sono verificati.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="validation" /> is a <see langword="null" /> reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="validation" /> è un riferimento <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
